p.k: Documentary, Animation, Short Bulgaria, Croatia, Germany (2012). Hrají: Harry Anichkin, Ivana Gavrilova, Eltimir Alexandrov. Režie: Ivan Bogdanov, Moritz Mayerhofer, Asparuh Petrov, Veljko Popovic, Rositsa Raleva, Dmitry Yagodin.
p.d: When did you last talk with your father? Will you ever ask him about those things that hurt you? In Father the reality of life is turned upside down to create an impossible dialogue - the dialogue between a child and a father that never happens.
